dcterms:creator: M. Emu
P. Yan
S. Choudhury
dcterms:description: A dataset used for analyzing the VNF placement problem as an Integer Linear Programming (ILP) model that guarantees low End-to-End (E2E) latency while preserving QoS requirements.
dcterms:title: VNF Placement Problem Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Vasilakos
M. Bunyakitanon
R. Nejabati
D. Simeonidou
dcterms:description: A dataset for examining VNF placement with a hierarchical Reinforcement Learning method that includes local prediction modules and a global learning component.
dcterms:title: VNF Placement with Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Liu
S. B. Alias
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on cost-efficient VNF placement in an industrial edge system, proposing a method to minimize costs while ensuring service quality.
dcterms:title: Cost-Efficient Virtual Network Function Placement Dataset

dcterms:creator: N. He
S. Yang
F. Li
S. Trajanovski
L. Zhu
Y. Wang
X. Fu
dcterms:description: A dataset that leverages deep reinforcement learning with an attention mechanism for VNF placement and routing, focusing on optimizing resource allocation.
dcterms:title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for VNF Placement Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Iwamoto
A. Suzuki
M. Kobayashi
dcterms:description: A dataset for optimal VNF scheduling aimed at minimizing the duration of QoS degradation during service migrations.
dcterms:title: VNF Scheduling Dataset

dcterms:creator: D. H. P. Nguyen
Y.-H. Lien
B.-H. Liu
S.-I. Chu
T. N. Nguyen
dcterms:description: A dataset for virtual network function placement that serves weighted services in NFV-enabled networks, focusing on maximizing service acceptance.
dcterms:title: Virtual Network Function Placement for Weighted Services Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Xuan
Y. Zhou
X. Zhao
Z. Liu
dcterms:description: A dataset for multi-agent deep reinforcement learning algorithms with a self-adaptation division strategy for VNF service chain deployment in SDN/NFV-enabled networks.
dcterms:title: Multi-agent Deep Reinforcement Learning for VNF Deployment Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Miyamura
A. Misawa
dcterms:description: A dataset for joint optimization of optical path provisioning and VNF placement in virtual content delivery networks.
dcterms:title: Joint Optimization of Optical Path Provisioning and VNF Placement Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Yang
B. Hu
Y. Feng
H. Huang
H. Lai
J. Tan
dcterms:description: A dataset for an online service function chain orchestration method aimed at profit maximization in edge computing networks.
dcterms:title: Online Service Function Chain Orchestration Dataset
